meanings.definition: relating to an owner or ownership
meanings.sent1: The proprietary document belonged to the boss.
meanings.sent2: The house's proprietary rights were clear.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed proprietary ownership of the sunny spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as proprietary as a secret treasure.
meanings.sent5: The proprietary key unlocked the hidden chest.

meanings.sent1: His proprietary attitude towards the car was evident.
meanings.sent2: The dog's proprietary behavior over the bone was amusing.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed a proprietary interest in the acorn.
meanings.sent4: The tree's proprietary shade was a welcome relief.
meanings.sent5: The proprietary collar marked the dog as special.

meanings.definition: owned by a particular company and protected by trademark or patent
meanings.sent1: The proprietary software was only available from that company.
meanings.sent2: The proprietary formula was a closely guarded secret.
meanings.sent3: The penguin had a proprietary look in its eye over the branded fish.
meanings.sent4: The proprietary technology was a game-changer in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The proprietary logo was instantly recognizable.
